title.rendered: H.E. Zubairu Dada declared open the Bilateral Political Consultations between Nigeria and The Netherlands

content.rendered:
The Hon. Minister of State for Foreign Affairs, H.E. Zubairu Dada declared open the Bilateral Political Consultations between Nigeria and The Netherlands held in the Ministry today, 3rd May, 2023.
The Bilateral Consultations proper was led on the Nigerian side by Amb. Samson Itegboje, Director IOD/DOOPS, MFA. While the Dutch delegation was led by Ms. Erica Schouten, Deputy Director-General, Political Affairs, MFA of The Netherlands.
The MoU establishing the framework for the Consultations focuses on strengthening cooperation in the areas of the economy, security, consular and migration matters.
